summary: This is a calendar entry for a court conference scheduled for Jeffrey Epstein on July 18, 2019, in Courtroom 17B at 500 Pearl Street. The entry was created on July 22, 2019, and includes an alarm reminder.

keyFacts: A court conference for Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for July 18, 2019.
The conference was to be held in Courtroom 17B at 500 Pearl Street.
The calendar entry was created on July 22, 2019, after the scheduled event date.
